Detailed Description

Class to represent the neighbor of a given block.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

SAMRAI::hier::GridGeometry::Neighbor::Neighbor ( const BlockId &  block_id,
const BoxContainer &  domain,
const Transformation &  transformation,
const bool  is_singularity 
) [inline]

Constructor.

Parameters:
[in] block_id The block id of the neighboring block
[in] domain The neighboring block's domain in the current block's index space
[in] rotation The rotation needed to align the axes of the neighboring index spaces
[in] shift The shift needed to shift the neighboring block to its correct position in the current index space.
[in] is_singularity True if the current block and the neighboring block abut at a reduced or enhanced connectivity singularity
